com.gilran.chess.client

Class HttpGetter

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.gilran.chess.client.HttpGetter

  • public class HttpGetter
extends java.lang.Object
    A class for managing HTTP GET requests.

    The HttpGetter hides the HTTP GET request by using only protobuf messages in its public interface.

    Author:
    Gil Ran
